channel.title: CVE Feed for jtdowney -- private_address_check ruby gem
channel.description: The latest CVEs for jtdowney -- private_address_check ruby gem

item.title: CVE-2017-0904|2024-09-17T01:56:09.414Z -- jtdowney -- private_address_check%20ruby%20gem
item.description: The private_address_check ruby gem before 0.4.0 is vulnerable to a bypass due to use of Ruby's Resolv.getaddresses method, which is OS-dependent and should not be relied upon for security measures, such as when used to blacklist private network addresses to prevent server-side request forgery.
